title: GetDeviceState (Method)
text:
METHOD GetDeviceState : DED.DEVICE_STATE
Returns the state of the device; if device state is
ERROR
further information can be read by
GetDeviceError
.
: return:
eDeviceState

rows.Name: xDiagnosisInfoAvailable
rows.Comment: TRUE: Diagnosis info can be read by callingGetDeviceDiagnosisInfo.
